intro: Hibbertia exposita, commonly known as the showy hibbertia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. Hibbertia exposita thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal regions and heathlands. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and conservation efforts.
